SELECT
TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy') AS base_ym,
TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q') AS base_ym,
TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm') AS base_ym,
acc_sbjc_nm, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM deposit_info WHERE bank_code = #{bankCode} AND new_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{stDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY
TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy'),
TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q'),
TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm'),
acc_sbjc_nm ORDER BY acc_sbjc_nm, base_ym

SELECT TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy') AS base_ym, TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q') AS base_ym, TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm') AS base_ym, cust_dscd_nm, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM deposit_info WHERE bank_code = #{bankCode} AND new_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{stDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy'), TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q'), TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm'), cust_dscd_nm ORDER BY cust_dscd_nm, base_ym

SELECT TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy') AS base_ym, TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q') AS base_ym, TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm') AS base_ym, MAX(new_dpsamt) as max, ROUND(AVG(new_dpsamt), 0) as avg, ROUND(MEDIAN(new_dpsamt), 0) AS mid FROM deposit_info WHERE bank_code = #{bankCode} AND new_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{stDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy') TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q') TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm') ORDER BY base_ym

WITH new_deposit_info AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy') AS base_ym, TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q') AS base_ym, TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm') AS base_ym, new_dpsamt, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM (SELECT * FROM deposit_info WHERE bank_code = #{bankCode} AND new_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{stDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy') TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q') TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm') ,new_dpsamt ) SELECT base_ym, new_dpsamt AS mod FROM new_deposit_info WHERE (base_ym, cnt) IN ( SELECT base_ym, MAX(cnt) FROM new_deposit_info GROUP BY base_ym ) ORDER BY base_ym
